actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with respect to the annuities payable under such Act to the widows of retired railroad employees.

summary.text: Provides, under the Railroad Retirement Act, that widows of retired railroad employees who received annuities under such Act shall receive the amount the retired employees were receiving.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with respect to the annuities payable under such Act to the widows of retired railroad employees.
